name: musical aliens
description:
https://itch.io/jam/aoejam2021
This is my first game jam. I never learned how to use any game engine, so I just wrote in javascript with p5.js xd
That might not have been the best idea for a rhythm game that requires accurate and quality sound
So please try to close other tabs and stuff or else the audio will lag

I made the songs. I kind of underestimated how hard it is and long it takes to make good music, so after spending hours on just the couple-second menu loop I decided I would just make it all piano instead

I don't know if there's a specific way I'm supposed to do this, but I got some sfx from here
https://www.freesoundeffects.com/
https://www.videvo.net/royalty-free-sound-effects/
https://freesound.org/
https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/

The art is all either computer-generated or drawn by me (I am the best artist) except for the earth which is https://publicdomainvectors.org/en/free-clipart/Planet-Earth/39650.html

Maybe next time I'll try to find & work with people who can actually make stuff
